actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to change the alloy and weight of the 1-cent piece.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to change the alloy and weight of the 1 cent piece whenever he determines that the use of copper in such piece is no longer practicable. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 317)

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to change the alloy and weight of the 1-cent piece.
